europeana:record.dc:title: Nigeriella, a new genus of West African Fig wasps Allied to Elisabethiella grandi (Hymenoptera Chalcidoidae, Agaonidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Wiebes J.T.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
europeana:record.dc:description: Description of Nigeriella gen. nov. for N. fusciceps spec. nov. (typespecies; Nigeria, from Ficus abutilifolia Miq.) and N. letouzeyi spec. nov. (Cameroons, from Ficus cf. dekdeknena (Miq.) A. Rich.). Keys to species of Elisabethiella Grandi and Nigeriella, and to African genera of Agaonidae; differentiation of subfamilies Agaoninae and Blastophaginae.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Nigeriella, a new genus of West African Fig wasps Allied to Elisabethiella grandi (Hymenoptera Chalcidoidae, Agaonidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 48) (Issue 5)
